name: Amantis.club
description: We are Amantis, A group that stands strong behind Cardano, dedicating our lives to making the world a better place through a fun environment of our interconnected projects and partnerships with a purpose to create a strong community behind each phase of our existence. Support our journey by staking with Amantis stake pool. Why stake with Amantis? Cardano is a way of life for us. “Not even a second thought“ and passionate about Cardano being the best for the future of humanity. Low fees 1%.  Contributing to the overall movement of the Amantis backed projects.  Delegators earn rewards in all of our interconnected projects and future partnerships by distributing the native tokens and or NFTs.  Visits Amantis.club for more info on bonus rewards for delegating to our pool.  Quoting Bob Marley :Don’t worry… about a thing, because every little thing… is gonna be alright. BUT ALSO ….  Get up Stand up, Don’t give up the fight.  Love each other. Let’s build a better future for our children to grow up in. Delegate your ADA with Amantis Stake Pool and we will do everything in our power to do what is right.
